thread.title: Ed Bernstein To Interview Dr. Felicia Stoler and Stephen Cloobeck
thread.title_full: Ed Bernstein To Interview Dr. Felicia Stoler and Stephen Cloobeck

author: prbuzz.com
title: Ed Bernstein To Interview Dr. Felicia Stoler and Stephen Cloobeck
text:
This week, Ed Bernstein will interview Dr. Felicia Stoler and Stephen Cloobeck, Chairman and Founder of Diamond Resorts International.
Dr. Stoler is a registered dietitian nutritionist, exercise physiologist and expert consultant in wellness and healthful living. She’s the author of several books including “Skinny in Fat Genes,” “The Healthy Way to Lose Weight and Feel Great,” and “Honey We’re Killing the Kids!”
She’ll be discussing topics such as improving your nutrition and natural remedies for colds.
Cloobeck is Chariman and Founder of Diamond Resorts International, a full service hospitality and vacation ownership company that has more than 333 vacation rentals in 34 countries.
Cloobeck has also appeared on Undercover Boss twice. On The Ed Bernstein Show, he’ll be discussing his appearances on the show.
Tune in to The Ed Bernstein Show Sunday at 3:00 p.m. to see both
